mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dms.dms_branch_status ( "height", "type", "branchIndex", "status" ) VALUES ( #{height}, ${type}, ${branchIndex}, ${status} ) ON CONFLICT ("height", "type", "branchIndex") DO UPDATE SET status = EXCLUDED.status;
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM dms.dms_branch_status WHERE "height" = #{height} AND "type" = #{type} AND "branchIndex" = #{branchIndex};
